newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - Oct 21.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - Oct 21.

text.p: These are significant stories in the Ivorian press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- African ministers start preparatory talks today ahead of summit meeting on Wednesday to launch the Alliance for the Industrialisation of Africa.

- Ivory Coast's national carrier Air Ivoire to resume thrice-weekly flights to Monrovia from October 27, says advertisement by the airline. Flights were suspended following a flareup of militia fighting in the Liberian capital last April when the city's airport was devastated.
- Creditors set conditions for financing Ivory Coast's environment programme which was discussed at a roundtable in Abidjan last week.
- Ivory Coast's Expo 96 trade fair next month to cost 700 million CFA francs, Prime Minister Daniel Kablan Duncan told during visit to exhibition grounds.
